comments: Tests covering the use of the REPLACE function.

tests.name: replace
statements: CREATE STREAM TEST (source VARCHAR) WITH (kafka_topic='test_topic', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT REPLACE(source, 'a', 'o') AS REPLACE, REPLACE(source, null, 'o') AS REPLACE_NULL, REPLACE(source, 'a', null) AS REPLACE_W_NULL FROM TEST;
